pullRequest.title: Enabling TLS connections from TPCC.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Summary:
Enabling TLS connections need the server key and server cert files to be
specified in the config file.
The key needs to be in the binary DER format instead of the pem
format which can be done as follows:
openssl pkcs8 -topk8 -inform PEM -in sever.key -outform DER -out server.key.der  -v1 PBE-MD5-DES -nocrypt
Reviewers:
Mihnea

nodes.bodyText: Should there be checking that workConf.getSslKey() > 0 at the same time ?

commit.message:
Enabling TLS connections from TPCC.

Summary:
Enabling TLS connections need the server key and server cert files to be
specified in the config file.
The key needs to be in the binary DER format instead of the pem
format which can be done as follows:

openssl pkcs8 -topk8 -inform PEM -in sever.key -outform DER -out server.key.der  -v1 PBE-MD5-DES -nocrypt

Reviewers:
Mihnea
